resource.chars:
mentioning the correspondence;
and the copy of the letter 
which I saw was not marked 
private. Moreover I think it 
is right that the President 
of both of the Societies responsible 
for the Expedition should know 
all that is going on officially 
regarding it. I did not 
discuss the merits of the 
question at our interview, and I have an open 
mind as regards them. But
